full_summary:
# Improved Tender Announcement
### Title
English: Fluke Deep-Well Compact Bath
French: Fluke Bains compacts à puits profond

### Contract Details
- Contract Number: cb-218-16814236
- Solicitation Number: W8486-249422/A
- Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-08T14:00:00
- Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-13
- Expected Contract End Date: 2024-02-29

### Description
The Department of National Defence is issuing this tender announcement as a requirement of the Supply Arrangement (SA) W8604-16SAM7B. Suppliers that do not already hold a Supply Arrangement in series E60HN-16ELEC with PSPC cannot submit a bid.

### Items Required
- Fluke Deep-Well Compact Bath (P/N 7381-26)
- Fluke 7381 Plastic Access Cover (P/N 2012-DCB)
- Fluke 7381 Bath Holding Fixture, TPW Cell (P/N 2027-DCBW)

### Delivery Details
- Requested delivery date for the above mentioned goods is February 29, 2024
- Goods will be delivered to the National Capital Region (NCR)

### Eligibility
- Suppliers must be pre-qualified to participate
- Interested suppliers can contact PSPC at steve.dumaresq@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca to find out how to become a qualified SA Holder

### Selection Criteria
- Suppliers will be evaluated based on the lowest price

### Trade Agreements
- This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information
- Justin Laundrie
- justin.laundrie@forces.gc.ca
- (343) 571-8929

Note: The rewritten entry includes more essential information regarding eligibility, selection criteria, trade agreements, and contact information, which enhances clarity and concision. The original document was lengthy and repetitive, which made it difficult to extract essential details. The text was also rephrased and restructured to improve readability. 

Few areas to further improve the text are: 
1. Clearly define what documents or requirements are needed for the solicitation. Governments can specify the formats and file types in clearer language.
2. Take the organization's customer service presentation more clearly and efficiently, making it more thorough.
